candidates.title: Utils & guide for mock application testing
candidates.body:
Mostly running almost the full application inside a test (as an
alternative to compile the binary and execute it externally, which is
problematic).

candidates.title: Fix panic in on_terminate after terminate
Ability to inject opts into the builder
candidates.body: To provide artificial ones for testing, for example.

candidates.title: Daemonization is unsafe, because of fork
candidates.body:
* Reflect that in the interface.
* Express it as an extension (this allows us to run earlier, making it
  easier to daemonize before any threads).
* Update and extend the guide for that.
